name: Chef John Doe
description: Chef John Doe is an expert in Indian cuisine, with over 10 years of experience in the culinary industry. He specializes in creating authentic dishes using traditional cooking techniques and locally-sourced ingredients.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.method: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill chicken until cooked. 3. Simmer tomato and cream until sauce thickens. 4. Add chicken to sauce. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 3. Add paneer and cream. 4. Cook until heated through. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Lamb Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Marinate lamb in yogurt and spices. 2. Cook rice separately. 3. Saute onion and spices. 4. Add lamb and cook until browned. 5. Layer rice and lamb in a pot. 6. Cook on low heat until rice is fluffy. Serve hot.

name: Chef Jane Smith
description: Chef Jane Smith is a master of Indian cuisine, with over 15 years of experience in the culinary industry. She has a passion for creating innovative dishes that blend traditional flavors with modern cooking techniques.

recipes.name: Aloo Gobi
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add potatoes and cauliflower. 3. Cook until tender. 4. Add tomato and cook until sauce thickens. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chana Masala
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add chickpeas and cook until tender. 3. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Korma
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Grind cashews into a paste. 3. Add chicken and cashew paste. 4. Cook until chicken is tender. 5. Add cream and cook until heated through. Serve hot.

name: Chef David Lee
description: Chef David Lee is a rising star in the world of Indian cuisine, with 8 years of experience in the culinary industry. He has a unique perspective on traditional dishes and loves to experiment with new ingredients and techniques.

recipes.name: Saag Paneer
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 3. Add paneer and cream. 4. Cook until heated through. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Bhindi Masala
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add okra and cook until tender. 3. Add tomato and cook until sauce thickens. 4. Add yogurt and cook until heated through. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Fish Curry
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add tomato and cook until sauce thickens. 3. Add coconut milk and fish. 4. Cook until fish is tender. Serve hot.

name: Chef Rakha Kumar
description: Chef Ritu Kumar is a renowned Indian chef with 10 years of experience in the culinary industry. She specializes in creating fusion dishes that combine traditional Indian flavors with international techniques.

recipes.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
recipes.method: 1. Marinate paneer in spices and yogurt. 2. Grill until golden brown. 3. Saute onion and spices. 4. Add tomato and cook until sauce thickens. 5. Add cream and cook until heated through. 6. Add grilled paneer. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chana Masala
recipes.method: 1. Saute onion and spices. 2. Add chickpeas and cook until tender. 3. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka
recipes.method: 1. Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. 2. Grill until golden brown. Serve hot.
